if listening yolact
ButtonSeperator
info:
This function first sets/resets button state when turning on the glove.

Then if the set/reset values are smaller than the incomming values, create an output string for the switch node. 

I can also just use the button numbers in the switch node so I am looking into that.

name: Button Handler
info: parses out which buttons have been pressed and combos. Sets an overall button counter, and last buttons pressed. Sets a glove page setting and seperates the button presses to the page switches
